description: Your personal supercharged AI - Remembers and adapts with every chat
title: OwnAI
introduction: OwnAI is a personal, evolving, supercharged AI that remembers and tailors itself to you over time. It acts as a companion that gets to know you through continuous interactions.
features: Personal AI that evolves with every interaction
GPT with memory for personalized experiences
Supercharged tools like humanization and web search
Complete control over your data with transparent settings
targetPeople: Individuals looking for a personalized AI companion

faqs.question: How do I manage my subscription?
Can OwnAI remember past conversations?
faqs.answer: Yes, OwnAI can remember and learn from past interactions.

faqs.question: How does OwnAI differ from other chatbots?
faqs.answer: OwnAI evolves with every interaction and offers a personalized experience through its memory system and supercharged tools.
